text:
is one of the 23 special wards of Tokyo, Japan.
The municipality calls itself "Arakawa City" in English.
Geography.
Arakawa is in east-central Tokyo. It borders Taitō on the south. Kita is on the ward's western border. Adachi is on the norther border.
Katsushika is on the east. Sumida are on the southeast border.
